arts.ttl: OM vs PSG – De Zerbi sets his rules ahead of the big match!
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 PM (CET) Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Olympique de Marseille (7th) at the Stade Vélodrome for the 5th matchday of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: OM vs PSG – Luis Enrique at the press conference: The Classico, the Ballon d’Or, and preparations
arts.sum: On Sunday, during the 5th matchday of Ligue 1 2025-2026, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Olympique de Marseille (7th) at the Stade Vélodrome (kick-off at 8:45 pm, CET).
